title: Which UEFA First Leg Game Offers Best Odds for New York Players ?
body_text:
Which UEFA First Leg Game Offers Best Odds, and Best Value, for Empire State Players?
This content was produced in partnership with Gambler Labs.
When the calendar turns to May, you can know one thing for sure: we are down to the nitty-gritty of the European football campaign.
This month, 12 teams, across three UEFA competitions, will look to book their places in the three finals that will take place at the end of May and the first 10 days of June.
Of course, everyone has their eyes on the main competition, the UEFA Champions League, which is in the semifinal round. But there are also the UEFA Europa League and Europa Conference League competitions, which will also kick off their first legs in the second week of May.
With that in mind, which of the six first leg ties offer the best value for real money players, bettors and fans with New York gambling sites?
Here is a look at a few of them, with an eye towards who might be playing in the finals, and a look as well at the futures odds for each tournament.
UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE TITLE FUTURES
Manchester City -143
Real Madrid +375
Inter +700
AC Milan +750
BEST FIRST LEG MATCHUP
Real Madrid (+210) v Manchester City (+128), draw (+245)
This is a rematch of last seasonâ€™s semifinals, which was won 6-5 on aggregate in dramatic fashion by Real Madrid with two goals in the final minutes of the second leg. This season, it might be down to Madrid to stop City from winning the treble. You can get great odds on either team at betMGM NY.
UEFA EUROPA LEAGUE TITLE FUTURES
Juventus +190
Roma +275
Bayer Leverkusen +275
Sevilla +375
BEST FIRST LEG MATCHUP
Juventus (-110) v Sevilla (+350), draw (+240)
The Italian team is back in the Serie A top four after a points deduction was overturned, and can now advance to a final if they can beat Sevilla. The Spanish side has dominated this competition, but Juventus looks to be great value at home.
UEFA EUROPA CONFERENCE LEAGUE TITLE FUTURES
West Ham United +185
Fiorentina +190
AZ Alkmaar +375
Basel +550
BEST FIRST LEG MATCHUP
Fiorentina (-190) v Basel (+525), draw (+335)
Serie A has five of the 12 teams left, and could have four teams playing in finals. In this contest, Fiorentina looks to be much too strong for Basel, and could win this game by multiple goals.
